unassigned.name: Acid Drone
body_text: Upkeep phase: Once this card is in the Battlefield, you may attach this card to a Monster or Character on the Battlefield. Once attached, this card counts as a Acid mana. Apply applicable effects immediately.

Upkeep phase: Once this card is in the Battlefield, you may have this card self-destruct. Each Monster on the Battlefield takes 1dR damage, where R = remaining damage capacity. Then place this card in Exile.
